devdoc.details: Adheres to - ISNOWETHERC20SplitsPayerDeployer:  General interface for the methods in this contract that interact with the blockchain's state according to the protocol's rules.

params._defaultBeneficiary: The address that'll receive the project's tokens when the splits payer receives payments.
params._defaultMemo: The memo that'll be forwarded with the splits payer's received payments.
params._defaultMetadata: The metadata that'll be forwarded with the splits payer's received payments.
params._defaultPreferAddToBalance: A flag indicating if received payments should call the `pay` function or the `addToBalance` function of a project.
params._defaultPreferClaimedTokens: A flag indicating whether issued tokens from the splits payer's received payments should be automatically claimed into the beneficiary's wallet.
params._defaultProjectId: The ID of the project whose treasury should be forwarded the splits payer contract's received payment leftovers after distributing to the default splits group.
params._defaultSplitsDomain: The splits domain to payout when this contract receives direct payments.
params._defaultSplitsGroup: The splits group to payout when this contract receives direct payments.
params._defaultSplitsProjectId: The ID of project for which the default splits are stored.
params._owner: The address that will own the splits payer.
params._splitsStore: A contract that stores splits for each project.

deploySplitsPayer(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Allows anyone to deploy a new splits payer contract.
